document.full_text: the pilot of an f-16 fighter taking part in the nato air operation in libya was forced to eject on landing at an airbase in italy wednesday, the military alliance said.
document.title: pilot of nato libya mission plane ejects on landing
lines_and_colors: the pilot of an f-16 fighter taking part in the nato air operation in libya was forced to eject on landing at an airbase in italy wednesday, the military alliance said.
